nodes.body: Ex: Bka’ ‘gyur klog pa dang kha ‘don byed pa’i rim pa (W15869), Bka’ ‘gyur gyi klog tshe kha skor phyogs gcig (W16527), Bka’ ‘gyur ‘don pa’i smon tshig (W16759).
nodes.title: About Rituals accompanying the reading of the Kangyur
